snippet: Ford Motor Company said it would introduce several models to bolster its struggling European division, including the Edge sport utility vehicle and the Mustang sports car.
abstract: Ford Motor Company says it will introduce several models to bolster its struggling European division, including the Edge sport utility vehicle and the Mustang sports car; raising its investment in Europe is a daring move for the company, which expects to lose more than $1 billion there in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Company said it would introduce several models to bolster its struggling European division, including the Edge sport utility vehicle and the Mustang sports car.

headline.seo: Ford Unveils New and Redone Cars for European Market
